attributes.action: publicly confirm the right of the Falkland Islands to receive and use any revenues from their natural resources in their own interests and as the Falkland Islands Government sees fit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make it clear that any revenues accruing from the exploitation of any natural resources of the Falklands and their use is a domestic matter for the Falkland Islands Government. The responsibility of the United Kingdom is limited to foreign policy and defence and, in those respects, primary consideration will be the wishes of the Falkland Islands Government and people.
